# xcode

**Type Property**

A value that indicates the StoreKit Testing in Xcode environment.

## Declaration

```swift
static let xcode: AppStore.Environment
```

## Getting the environment value

- **production**: A value that indicates the production server environment.
- **sandbox**: A value that indicates the sandbox server environment.

items.description: A value that indicates the production server environment.
items.name: production

items.description: A value that indicates the sandbox server environment.
items.name: sandbox
